dmca.title: electronicebuys.com Everything has been in compliance.
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Jayme Williams [mailto:jayme@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, July 11, 2006 1:12 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: electronicebuys.com Everything has been in compliance.
Subject: RE: electronicebuys.com Everything has been in compliance.



Hello Robert, 

 

We have rechecked this website and there are currently still SONY images
remaining on this site. Please understand that the entire image must be
removed entirely. This site is still in compliance and we need to be
certain that these items be removed as they are in violation of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act. The infringing URLs are below and
please ensure that this get s taken care of. Please let me know if you
need further assistance. The case between Sony TV and
electronicebuys.com remains open. 

 

http://electronicebuys.com/productview.aspx?CatID=1&ID=1476&Name=Televis
ions

Sent: Monday, July 10, 2006 7:05 PM

Subject: Fwd: electronicebuys.com Everything has been in compliance.

 

All Sony Pictures have been removed

Robert
